messages.main_subtitle: A company that develops by setting up principles
messages.the_best_product_and_customer_oriented_s: The best product and Customer-oriented service
messages.address_detail: 295, Asanvalleydong-ro, Dunpo-myeon, Asan-si, Chungcheongnam-do, Republic of Korea
messages.ceo_hello: Jungwon Electronics, A company that develops by setting up principles.
messages.ceo_detail_1: Jungwon Electronics pursues the best products and services based on the best technology and also aims for management that considers the environment.
messages.ceo_detail_2: It is still not huge but it is firm. We strive to create a company that develops and produces products for customers around the world step by step.
messages.ceo_detail_3: Thank you for your trust and support.
messages.ceo_detail_4: Please watch over us with unchanging affection.
messages.main_busines_0: Manufacturing and sales of printer, carrier, developer
messages.main_busines_1: Manufacturing and sales of remanufactured toner cartridge
messages.main_busines_2: Manufacturing and sales of remanufactured PCU
messages.main_busines_3: Sales of parts for AS of printers and printer
messages.company_product_0: A company that communicates with customers based on trust and technology, Jungwon Electronics Co., Ltd., established in 2011, is a remanufacturing and export-oriented manufacturing company specializing in the production and sale of consumables such as office multifunction devices and PCUs. In particular, we are carrying out a factory that produces and supplies OEMs for carriers and developers, which are major core materials, under the technical support of Sindoh. As an export agency for items of each part of Sindoh, a global leader, we are expanding our capabilities by exporting genuine and remanufactured products of Ricoh and Konica Minolta to the world.
messages.company_product_1: First, production and supply of developer and carrier for copier printers.
messages.company_product_2: In cooperation with Sindoh, the transfer of developer and carrier production facilities, and OEM production and supply contracts have been signed to establish the Asan Dunpo Plant and relocate the head office. (Production  started at the end of 2021).
messages.company_product_4: Ricoh Aficio produces and exports genuine PCU and remanufactured PCU.
messages.company_product_5: Third, remanufactured PCU and remanufacturing unit for Konica Minolta
messages.company_product_6: Manufactures and sells various remanufacturing units such as transfer belt units, drum units, fixing units, toner cartridges, developing units, toners, rollers and sleeves for Konica Minolta multifunction printer.
messages.company_product_7: Jungwon Electronics Co., Ltd. is constantly striving for technology development and quality control in order to always promise better quality to customers.
messages.history_2: Starting exports to the USA, Europe, and Southeast Asia
messages.history_3: Awarded the Million Dollar Export Tower
messages.history_8: Starting exports to the USA and Southeast Asia for Carrier
